name: Keyboard Racer
description:
Keyboard Racer is a single player recreation of the game TypeRacer

For anyone who hasn't heard of this type of games this is a type of games in which you write and based on your writing speed your car moves with higher speed (Faster typing faster speed).

In this version of the game you play vs. an robot with a set speed that is changable in the games interface.

The sentences you type are randomly chosen.

You are presented with 8 diffrent speed options for the bot which variate from easy to impossible.

You have staticstics like the WPM ( Words Per Minute ), which is the speed you are typing at. How many correct vs. how many you have typed in total characters. And how many word in total have been typed.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For any questions or bug reports please email - keyboard.racer@abv.bg
